# maths

$$\begin{eqnarray*}
w_r=\alpha p\theta_r\left(\alpha  +(1-\alpha)\left(\frac{S_r}{L_r}\right)^{\frac{\sigma-1}{\sigma}} \right)^{\frac{1}{\sigma-1}}, \\
q_r=(1-\alpha)p\theta_r\left(\alpha \left(\re{\frac{L_r}{S_r}}\right)^{\frac{\sigma-1}{\sigma}} +(1-\alpha) \right)^{\frac{1}{\sigma-1}},
\end{eqnarray*}$$
